title: These Casually Cool Suede Hobo Bags Are Already Dominating 2025
‘People thought we liked being touched and grabbed’: a former Abercrombie model recalls brand’s dark days
description: Kai Braden was a shirtless greeter during the brand’s mid-aughts peak. Twenty years later, his advocacy has helped secure first-of-their-kind protections for fashion workersSomething felt off about Kai Braden’s first day working retail at an Abercrombie & Fitch store in 2006. His bosses sat him down to watch an onboarding video, but instead of learning how to properly fold shirts or work the register, Braden watched a corporate-produced montage of young men romping through fields in various stages of undress.“[It was] stock footage of shirtless guys with their jeans falling down so you could see a little bit of their butt,” Braden remembered. He struggled to understand how this would relate to his job. “I was like, ‘What does this have to do with anything?’” Continue reading...
author: Alaina Demopoulos

title: Quirky cardigans and comfy knits: the cosy side of Brutalist star Joe Alwyn – in pictures

title: 24 Faux-Fur Coats & Jackets That Scream Cozy Luxe
description: .disclaimer{width:90%;margin-bottom:1rem}.disclaimer__lines{width:100%;margin:0 auto;border-bottom:1px solid #999;padding:0;max-width:150px}.disclaimer__copy{width:100%;max-width:355px;font-family:Brown Regular,sans-serif;font-size:.9rem;font-weight:300;line-height:1.3em;color:#333;padding:0 0 .4rem;margin:1rem auto;text-align:center} All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission. Few things manage to be as equally luxe and practical for winter as a faux-fur coat. These trending jackets bring much-needed warmth to brisk temperatures, all while adding that It factor to elevate any outfit. Whether you’re embracing the mob wife aesthetic by pairing your coat with a winter dress and knee-high boots, or topping off a matching sweatsuit with equally snuggly outerwear, a faux-fur jacket is the perfect finishing touch to almost any look. And forget the usual sea of brown and black faux fur coats: Bold colorways (like red), patterns (like leopard print), and textures (from plush shearling to shaggy fibers) are dominating this season. Ahead, 24 of our favorite faux-fur coats — including plus-size options — at every length your heart could desire.  DashDividers_1_500x100 Long Faux-Fur Coats A faux-fur longline coat is the perfect luxe layer for elevated evening looks, from winter wedding guest outfits to formal nights out. Whether calf- or ankle-skimming lengths, belted or double-breasted, solid or printed, these styles are equal parts cozy and sophisticated. DashDividers_1_500x100 Midi Faux-Fur Coats A midi coat is the ultimate chameleon, effortlessly transitioning from day to night and occasion to occasion. Whether you’re after a sleek style with toggle closures or an oversized fit to wrap yourself in (or leave open to flaunt your ‘fit), there’s a hip- or thigh-length option waiting for you. DashDividers_1_500x100 Short Faux-Fur Coats For everyday wear, a cropped faux-fur jacket is your go-to for everything from brunch to the office to grocery runs. These practical buttoned and zip-up styles feel extra special with oversized statement collars — a major 2025 fashion trend. DashDividers_1_500x100 Plus Size Faux-Fur Coats The most stylish, size-inclusive faux-fur jackets are here, ready for every occasion and every length you could want. From extra-cropped hems and bold prints to chinchilla-inspired textures, these picks are available in sizes up to 30 and 6X. Like what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?These Are The 10 Trendiest Winter Coats & JacketsBundle Up In These 11 Cozy Puffer Jackets30 Best Winter Dresses For Parties, Work & More
author: Alicia Lansom

title: Heart-Shaped Earrings Add The Sweetest Touch To Every Ensemble
description: Now that we've added bows to nearly everything in our lives, we're turning our attention to another coquette-friendly trend: Hearts. It's the perfect way to tap into your playful side, and earrings are a dainty and understated way to try them out. Thankfully, earrings with motifs such as hearts are no longer considered childish or cheap little trinkets. The whimsical pieces of jewelry are now stunning reminders of love crafted in 14K gold with pavé designs from luxury designers like Swarovski and Monica Vinader, along with more affordable jewelry brands such as Ana Luisa. Where would I even wear them, or what would I do with them, you say? Heart-shaped earrings work well for a multitude of events. You can simply add cute touches to your daily ensembles with a pair of heart-shaped studs, huggies, or hoops, or gift glistening dangly styles for anniversaries or other special occasions. If you're looking further ahead, you can even prep in advance for your Valentine's Day attire. So scroll on and prepare to fall in love with the best gold, silver, diamond, and crystal heart-shaped earrings; they're all just ahead. All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Kendra Scott Ari Heart Gold Huggie Earrings In Iridescent DrusyFor a little something extra to your outfits, don a pair of iridescent heart huggies from Kendra Scott. They are available in nine shimmering colorways, from this iridescent quartz to a vibrant firey red.Shop Kendra ScottKendra Scott Ari Heart Gold Huggie Earrings In Iridescent Drusy, $, available at Kendra ScottBaubleBar Laura Earrings Make a statement that'll count with BaubleBar's chic oversized heart-shaped earrings. Although they're chunky, they're lightweight and hypoallergenic. Shop BaubleBarBaubleBar Laura Earrings, $, available at BaubleBarAngara Heart-Shaped Ruby and Diamond Swirl Drop EarringsAngara is all about timeless designs with a fresh twist — like these ruby drop studs. The vibrant stones bring a bold pop of color, making them an elegant upgrade from typical heart-shaped hoops, studs, or charm huggies.Shop AngaraAngara Heart-Shaped Ruby and Diamond Swirl Drop Earrings, $, available at AngaraGorjana 14k Gold Open Heart HuggiesGold hoops get an elevated twist with these open-heart huggies from Gorjana. The everyday style comes with the option of a pair or single earring. Shop GorjanaGorjana 14k Gold Open Heart Huggies, $, available at GorjanaMejuri Mini Heart Pavé Diamond Stud EarringsHeart-shaped earrings, but make it an heirloom. Mejuri has created a timeless, delicate pavé diamond-encrusted pair that is a gift for a lifetime. Shop MejuriMejuri Mini Heart Pavé Diamond Stud Earrings, $, available at MejuriAna Luisa Jessica Silver Take your pick from Ana Luisa's silver or gold puff heart hoops. The hypoallergenic, water-resistant, and anti-tarnishing earrings also have a two-year warranty. Shop Ana LuisaAna Luisa Jessica Puffed Heart Hoops, $, available at Ana LuisaMonica Vinader Lab-Created Diamond Heart Huggie Hoop EarringsSmall and dainty they may be, but these twinkling heart-shaped diamond earrings have bags of charm and romance. Shop Monica Vinader At NordstromMonica Vinader Lab-Created Diamond Heart Huggie Hoop Earrings, $, available at NordstromJenny Bird Layla Drop Earrings Hearts don't have to be strictly cute and whimsical. This sculptural, abstract design transforms the classic design into something chic and modern.Shop Jenny Bird At RevolveJenny Bird Layla Drop Earrings, $, available at RevolveMaison Miru Classic Heart Nap Earrings Attention, Maison Miru fans. The famous nap earrings also come in a tiny heart-shaped version in gold that deserves your worthy attention. Catch them all while you can!Shop Maison MiruMaison Miru Classic Heart Nap Earrings, $, available at Maison MiruSwarovski Volta Stud EarringsSwarovski’s Volta Stud earrings steal the spotlight with their ribbon-like design and twirling pavé crystals. Pair them with the matching necklace and bracelet for the full dazzling effect.Shop SwarovskiSwarovski Volta Stud Earrings, $, available at SwarovskiSwarovski Matrix Hoop EarringsSilver fans, Swarovski has got you covered with these bold, fashion-forward hoops; set with a full pavé of baguette-cut clear crystals for blinding shine.Shop SwarovskiSwarovski Matrix Hoop Earrings, $, available at SwarovskiGabi Rielle Wrapped & Ready 14K Yellow Gold Evil Eye Heart Drop Earrings These aren't your everyday cutesy heart earrings. Affordable luxury brand Gabi Rielle has created an edgy gold evil eye drop earring in a striking red and green that'll enchant any viewer. Shop Gabi Rielle At Nordstrom RackGabi Rielle 14k Yellow Gold Evil Eye Heart Drop Earrings, $, available at Nordstrom RackLike what you see? author: Vivien Lee

title: Birkenstock's Viral Clogs Got a Wintry Update - and They Feel Like Cozy House Slippers
description: If you're like me and you couldn't find a pair of Birkenstock's Boston Soft Footbed Clogs in your preferred size and color a couple of seasons ago, it may have been for the best. Turns out, the shearling-lined fall- and winter-friendly iteration of the brand's popular clog is softer, cozier, and more comfortable than the Boston Soft Footbed Clogs. I pounced on buying Birkenstock's Boston Genuine Shearling Lined Clogs ($175) as soon as they appeared in Nordstrom's new arrivals section, and I've been wearing them nonstop. What I Love About Birkenstock's Shearling-Lined Clogs They feel like a fuzzy slipper but have the ergonomic design and comfortable yet sturdy footbed that Birkenstock's Boston clogs are known for. I was initially worried that the shearling lining might make my feet sweat, but unlike synthetic versions, genuine shearling is naturally temperature-regulating. On warmer days or when I quickly need to slip into something, I've worn them barefoot, but they also manage to look cool with a quarter sock on chillier days. When our editor reviewed the version without shearling, she was expecting them to be comfortable but was surprised by how versatile they are as well. I've been thrilled to discover the same thing as I've thrown these shearling-lined mules on with everything from leggings and sweats to barrel jeans and even a jumpsuit. As far as convenience goes, I love that I can put them on hands-free. As a mom of two little ones and a brand-new puppy, they've become my go-to for 6 a.m. potty breaks when I'm half-asleep and my hands are occupied with a leash, treats, and a squirming pup. What's Worth Noting About Birkenstock's Shearling-Lined Clogs At $175, they're an investment and pricier than Birkenstock's Boston Soft Footbed Clogs, but the shearling is a worthy upgrade. I opted for the taupe color which has a tonal aesthetic with the matching suede and shearling. I like that the color isn't too light or dark, but I was concerned about getting them stained with dirt and water. Amazingly enough, they still look practically new despite how much I've been wearing them. I've gotten clumps of dirt on them but have been able to easily brush the dirt off. I've even gotten caught in an unexpected sprinkle and the raindrops didn't stain the suede either. Who Are Birkenstock's Shearling-Lined Clogs Best For? Whether you want a pair of shoes that are comfortable and easy or are more concerned with crafting an effortless aesthetic, you'll be equally pleased. If you have sheepskins draped over furniture or a favorite pair of shearling-lined boots, these versatile shoes are a no-brainer. Additional Details About Birkenstock's Shearling-Lined Clogs If you're between sizes, order the next size up. These are built on a unisex shoe construction, but the sizes reflect women's shoe sizes. They have an adjustable strap with a buckle closure. They have a contoured footbed with arch support. Where Are Birkenstock's Shearling-Lined Clogs Available? You can buy these clogs at Nordstrom, Amazon, and Birkenstock. Rating: Angela Elias (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping. In her former roles at PS, she led the relaunch of its Latine identity and family-focused verticals, directed its Home vertical, and hosted shopping segments. She has nearly 15 years of experience working in the lifestyle space as a writer, editor, content strategist, director, on-camera talent, and publicist.
author: Angela Elias

title: The 28 Best Sneakers For Women - From Adidas Sambas to Hoka Trainers
description: Being comfortable in your own shoes never goes out of style, so investing in a top-tier sneaker collection is always a smart idea. When it comes to picking out the best sneakers, we look for a few key elements: good sneaker design, quality materials, and the perfect fit - because who wants to be uncomfortable? Our editors test out so many different types of shoes to provide you with the best product recommendations, and we boast a particular expertise on sneakers (call us sneakerheads, if you will). Love some casual, everyday sneakers? We've got you covered. Prefer sportier, performance sneakers for working out? We found those, too. And of course, if you're looking for cute sneakers that you can dress up for work, we've tried our fair share. To help you find the best women's sneakers to add to your wardrobe, we enlisted our expert editors, along with a handful of celebrities we've interviewed - like Kate Hudson, Ashley Graham, and Ayesha Curry - for their masterful recommendations of the best women's sneakers for 2025. These picks cover a range of styles, so you're bound to find your perfect shoe. What to Look For in the Best Women's Sneakers Whether you want something modern and playful or sleek and classic, we've uncovered the best of the best trending this year, and we'll tell you all the reasons we love these stylish sneakers. The styles fall into a number of different design categories, including: best trendy sneakers, best sustainable sneakers, best athletic sneakers, best high-top sneakers, best white sneakers, best classic sneakers, and best sneakers for walking. At the moment, fashion forecasters predict sporty dad sneakers will continue to be big throughout 2025 - particularly styles from brands like New Balance and Adidas. In an homage to the '90s and early aughts, chunky platform sneakers are also being embraced by stylists and celebrities alike - as showcased via New York Fashion Week street style. And the newly debuted Reebok Classic AZ Shoes are primed to be the hottest everyday sneaker this year, thanks to its neutral palette that's easy to style with a range of outfits. Our own sneaker recommendations tout brands like Nike, Converse, Puma, and more. Word of advice: your shoe closet is about to get a whole lot fuller, so make some extra room. Keep reading to shop our guide to the best sneakers for women.
author: Kyley Warren
